text:
Saatchi & Saatchi has engaged Mason Rodriguez to provide services for the Smart fashion Series on behalf of Camilla. With the rise of fashion innovation in Australia, Australians are seeking better fashion options. As the campaign's subject matter expert, Mason Rodriguez will deliver key messages across media and social channels. This campaign supports the brand's leadership in fashion.

INFLUENCER AGREEMENT

This agreement is between Camilla and the Influencer for Camilla Trends Campaign 2025.

COMMERCIAL TERMS:
- Total Fee: $3,084 AUD (inclusive of GST)
- Payment Terms: Net 30 days from invoice date
- Invoice Requirements: Tax invoice required upon completion

DELIVERABLES:
- 1 x Instagram posts

TERMS AND CONDITIONS:
- Engagement Period: 1 months
- Exclusivity Period: 2 weeks
- Territory: Australia
- Usage Rights: 12 months from campaign launch
- Content Rights: Camilla retains full commercial rights

COMPLIANCE:
- All content must comply with ACMA guidelines and ASA codes
- Content is subject to client approval before publication
- Disclosure requirements must be met per ACCC guidelines

LEGAL:
This agreement is governed by Australian law and subject to the jurisdiction of Australian courts.

Agreed terms are subject to final contract execution.
labels: profile_Golden Gaytime x Keith Schleiger Talent Agreement
